column5: Traffic was bumper to bumper due to a couple of accidents going North. We were on our way South and it was thick all the way from Barrie to Vaughan.  This was around 4:30, so hopefully they have it moving again.

Was on Simcoe this morning EARLY...for Lakers. Did well for size. The traffic started in Barrie and went all the way to the 401 bumoer to bumoer and stopped a lot of places. Even 27 was packed. Glad I was going south....
I won't see the 400 again until September, post Labour Day.  :clapping:

Should have seen it yesterday  I get to commute from Barrie > Toronto daily so I know all about that stupid highway.  Luckily, I have a few backroads that usually gets me around the bad stuff when the 400 is packed solid.
Nice thing about living in Pickering, we never use the 400 to go north. Straight up Hiway 12, usually moves well.
